comment: This semester has just started but I can already tell he is a great teacher! To be very honest this is my second time taking organic chemistry :( but with professor Zane, he makes learning organic chemistry very easy! I have a hard time grasping hard concepts but he's making it very easy to understand!

Professor Bertolli is a very caring and patient instructor. He explains concepts clearly and takes time to answer all questions. His practice exams are extremely helpful and very similar to the actual tests. He also curves generously, which helps a lot. If you show up and put in the effort, you'll do well. Highly recommend!

JUST DO IT! you won't regret it! I dont know how I didn't get him for lecture but Bertoli is the creme de la creme' of Organic Chemistry. I had him for lab and sat right by his desk all his students marveled at how great of a professor he was and he even helped me with my lecture assignments.WHATEVER YOU DO DONT TAKE DUFF OR HASELTINE. wait for him

TAKE HIM!! I took him for the Ochem lecture and thought it would be impossible to get an A, but I got an A. The tests are just like the practice tests. He will answer any emails, even late at night, but you do have to study. Ochem isn't a class you can get by in, so you have to work, but he makes it doable. He is so good, so please take him!!

Best Best i mean BEST professor I have had at KSU. He is the most caring and will actually sit down and explain the material even if you have dumb questions. He also helped with the lecture despite of only having him for lab. The patience he has, I have not met any other professor with his patience. I would absolutely recommend him.

I had him for CHEM 1152 and he's one of my favorite professors. He is extremely knowledgeable about chemistry and explains concepts VERY well in class. He is also really nice.
He wants to help you understand the material, so TAKE HIM.

Incredibly eager to help you in the lab. You can tell he genuinely enjoys what he does. Gives great feedback and elucidates concepts that can be super foreign and difficult. Almost failed the lecture (different instructor) and passed with flying colors in his lab with his aid
Professor Bertoli is goated. Would've taken him for OChem 2 lab, if his lab wasn't so late in the day. He will answer any question you have even if it is a simple question. Lab notebooks were simple.

I took him for lab and he is the best professor u can ask for. Fair grading and does not make the class unnecessarily hard and genuinely wants you to understand what you are doing. I hate chemistry but he made the class so bearable i cant complain. No time wasted writing lab notebooks and only 3 lab reports. Take him if u can! No regrets.

Highly recommend Professor Bertoli. He was very helpful and hands on during the labs, and always made sure to answer any questions I had in depth. Decently quick turn around for grades, always gave feedback on D2L so you know where you lost points to improve on the next assignment. He really does care about his students and makes the lab enjoyable!

Mr. Bertoli was a super helpful lab professor and was always willing to help! Although at times would be a tough grader on Labflow, he always will answer any questions. Make sure to always do all quizzes and lab reports for a good grade.

he's such a helpful guy and any time i would have a question about something in lab he would make sure he took the time to thoroughly explain it. he's a fair grader and gives great feedback. he made learning the material easy and i felt like i learned more from him than my lecture. he's super nice as well
Great for feedback. He was super helpful in class too
